about_the_game:
PvP
Go on a solo mission or join a clan to roam arround and sink submarines of enemy factions.
Camp trading routes to plunder the cargo of other players.
Participate in world events to find yourself in PvP hotspots.
Unlock custom skins and titles via gaining fame to show other players you are not the one to pick a fight with.

PvE
Fight with NPCs to gather valuables, experience and money to upgrade your sub.

Station Trade
Buy materials from one station and sell it to another one if you are lucky or strong enough to survive the journey.

Gathering
Travel arround the map and gather the materials floating arround to sell them to stations for profit.

Clans
Join a clan to be a greater force. Fight with your enemies together.

Community

Discord
Join the community to follow the progress and participate in play tests.

Reddit

Youtube

Website

name: Tidal Nexus Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: Tidal Nexus Online is a submarine themed old school open world MMO. Fight with monsters, trade and collect valuables in the depths to upgrade your sub. Join clans, participate in world events, make friends and enemies along the way.
